name: Flipper (itch) (hiddendev)
description:
Made for the OndreJam-1.

Use your platforming skills and ability to switch gravity to help your character reach the other side of the temple.

  • Use Up or Down keys to jump over obstacles.
  • Use Spacebar while in mid-air to switch gravity.

Unfortunately, it's just a prototype, so there's only one single level to play. But I hope you find the idea interesting. :D
